label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_029
content:
## 2026-01-30 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /storage/cluster/usage: REQUESTS 12000 req | p50: 45ms p95: 120ms p99: 250ms | err: 0.2% (24 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/node/utilization: REQUESTS 9500 req | p50: 30ms p95: 85ms p99: 150ms | err: 0.1% (10 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/rebalance/start: REQUESTS 300 req | p50: 60ms p95: 150ms p99: 300ms | err: 0.3% (1 error) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/compaction/run: REQUESTS 8000 req | p50: 55ms p95: 130ms p99: 280ms | err: 0.2% (16 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/backup/verify: REQUESTS 2000 req | p50: 42ms p95: 100ms p99: 180ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /storage/quota/check: REQUESTS 5000 req | p50: 25ms p95: 70ms p99: 140ms | err: 0.1% (5 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/ingest: REQUESTS 4000 req | p50: 35ms p95: 90ms p99: 200ms | err: 0.2% (8 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/metadata/query: REQUESTS 15000 req | p50: 40ms p95: 95ms p99: 170ms | err: 0.1% (15 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/health/status: REQUESTS 6000 req | p50: 20ms p95: 50ms p99: 100ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-07: CPU 98% | Mem 92% | Disk Used 99% | Conns: 1200 | Net: 12.1/10.6 Gbps
- stor-b-18: CPU 82% | Mem 84% | Disk Used 99% | Conns: 950 | Net: 9.2/8.4 Gbps
- stor-c-26: CPU 73% | Mem 78% | Disk Used 97% | Conns: 800 | Net: 7.5/6.9 Gbps
- meta-01: CPU 88% | Mem 97% | Disk Used 92% | Conns: 650 | Net: 5.3/4.5 Gbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-storage: active 150 | idle 20 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 2 | max 200 | avg_wait 12ms
- pool-meta: active 50 | idle 10 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 70 | avg_wait 8ms
- pool-rebalance: active 16 | idle 4 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 25 | avg_wait 15ms
- pool-io: active 80 | idle 15 | waiting 3 | exhaustion 1 | max 100 | avg_wait 10ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 85% | Bandwidth: 4.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 12,000

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] Capacity threshold on stor-a-07: utilization 99%
- [SEVERE] Quota hard blocks on tenants: 9 blocks active
- [WARNING] Pending compactions: 164
- [ERROR] Scrub errors: 58
- [INFO] Restore drill completed: RTO 51 min

### Deployments & Changes
- Capacity controls activated: halted non-critical writes, approval required for bulk ingest
- War-room established with tenant owners for quota management
- Continuous compaction mode initiated, discretionary maintenance postponed
- Restore drill performed for audit readiness, bandwidth reservation documented

### Events
- Utilization reached 92.8% effective free only 70 TB; invoked incident-level capacity controls: halt all non-critical writes and require approvals for any bulk ingest
- Quota hard blocks escalated to 9; established war-room with tenant owners to coordinate immediate deletions and archival migrations
- Compaction pending surged to 164 with scrub errors 58; initiated continuous compaction mode and postponed all discretionary maintenance
- Restore drill performed for audit readiness; RTO 51 minutes, noted that restore speed is impacted by high disk busy—documented mitigation to reserve bandwidth during drills

### On-Call
- Shift: Calvin U. 16 pages. 27 tickets. Status: Degraded/Critical; near-capacity operation with strict write controls, continuous compaction, and active tenant coordination for emergency space recovery
